articles.author: Mark Berman
articles.title: American Bar Association sues Trump administration over law firm sanctions - The Washington Post
articles.description: The group said President Donald Trump was trying to intimidate lawyers and law firms to prevent them from challenging him in court.
articles.content: The American Bar Association sued the Trump administration Monday over the presidents sanctions on law firms, saying he was threatening the independence of lawyers and trying to intimidate them from … [+4975 chars]
